pricing_restrictions: No price increases above 15% within a single quarter.
Must include sales tax in listed menu prices.
Minimum wage compliance required for all baristas.
Discounts cannot exceed 50% of listed price without manager approval.

product_information.summary: A concentrated shot of coffee made by forcing hot water through finely-ground beans. Sourced from sustainable farms in Colombia.
Espresso with steamed milk and a layer of thin foam. Available with cow's milk or oat milk.
Espresso with equal parts steamed milk and milk foam, topped with cocoa powder.
Brewed coffee poured over ice, served unsweetened or sweetened.
Flaky, buttery pastry baked fresh daily from local ingredients.
Soft baked good that pairs well with coffee.
